captions.text: [SHINee] Hello, We are SHINee!

[JONG HYUN] Well, this is where we will shoot a music video for 
the soundtrack of drama "The Queen's Classroom"
We, SHINee sang its soundtrack "Green Rain"

Q. Introduce us about "Green Rain", 
the sound track of drama "The Queen's Classroom"

[JONG HYUN] The "Green Rain" is a medium tempo song with 
cheerful lyrics which will bring lots of hope to growing youths.

I believe everyone can enjoy it a lot.
[KEY] Well, its title is "Green Rain"
[JONG HYUN] Yeah~ so refreshing
[KEY] Right. Refreshing and fresh.... look at my hair.
[JONG HYUN] Ah~ totally refreshing color.
[KEY] Yes. Like a golden unripe apple

[JONG HYUN] Yeah you are right. It has such a refreshing feeling,
and this is a song that will remind you of your childhood memories
So I hope lots of you listen to this song, the "Green Rain"

[TAE MIN] This is such a hopeful song and its lyrics are so pretty, 
I believe it goes along well with young children.
Q. Tell your fans about SHINee's recent news

[JONG HYUN] We are carrying out very busy schedule recently.
As we have Arena Tour in Japan, we are now busy preparing for that.

And I believe lots of fans are worrying about me..?
[MIN HO] You are back from injury.

[JONG HYUN] Yes but I came back with healthy condition, 
even healthier than before so you don't have to worry about me
and I will keep up my best, please send us lots of support!
Q. Tell us about the concept of MV and funny episodes while shooting

[JONG HYUN] The concept of MV is us, SHINee and other actors
of drama do the group dance altogether, freshly

Also, there are individual lip scenes of our members.
By the way, I believe I have felt a lot while shooting this MV
Well, should I say I learned how to work pleasantly?

[ONEW] Somewhat, I felt like I returned to the childhood.
And there was a feeling of being 'innocent' in the air.

[KEY] We came to the school today, 
and also went into the classrooms

since other actors are all very young, 
I felt like I went back to that age again and play around

[JONG HYUN] What a memories!
We all have been healed today.
Q. There was some distraction attack by other members

[JONG HYUN] Well, I am a pro.
So I finished my shooting part perfectly no matter what.
Q. Introduce us about the group dance you perform in MV

[JONG HYUN] There is a group dance we perform in MV 
with other young actors and actors from the drama

If you watch the whole drama, from the beginning to the end,
when the whole season of drama is about to end

you can easily do the dance even without realizing.
It is that simple and easy move

[MIN HO] You roll and clap, stretch your arms,
we did some moves that go along well with the music

[JONG HYUN] As it is really easy dance that everyone can learn,
I believe everyone who watches the drama can follow the move.
[ONEW] Hope you all enjoy it!
Q. How do you feel about shooting the MV for soundtrack of drama?

[TAE MIN] I believe this is our first time shooting MV for the soundtrack
With young kids, we also felt being very energetic and made memories with them
Well, I would say that I really want to watch this drama.

I received lots of energy from kids today, and felt something innocent..
It reminds me of my childhood time.
Q. To the fans

[ONEW] We SHINee participated the soundtrack, titled "Green Rain"
Please send us lots of love and anticipate for our next step too.

Untill now, we were shining SHINee.
[SHINee] Thank you!!
[JONG HYUN] Please watch the drama "The Queen's Classrom" a lot.

title: SHINee 샤이니_Green Rain (From MBC Drama "여왕의 교실") MV Making film + Interview
